properties.script:
import requests

url = "$activity.definition_activity_02FBXX8LZ44RM5Blj5prWmYBEs7n2eOJHv6.output.parts[0]$"

querystring = {"api_key":"$activity.definition_activity_02FBBHHNXSU2T0XP7xPJblr4wca0DYDFjKS.output.variable_workflow_027QB1203EA8L2esNnMu54NvRsQLHdiT14N$"}

payload = $workflow.definition_workflow_02F6W72RTSUA95xz9aHSz4qahX8QFimg9Fh.local.variable_workflow_02FBXR8SO6TC94TaIPzIP8iUKbKstuKuJTH$
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
response = requests.request("POST", url, json=payload, headers=headers, params=querystring)

print(response.text)

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)
